revised_title: The Persistence of the Blastopore and Formation of Mesoblast in Lamprey Development
tldr: The author investigates the formation of the mesoblast and the persistence of the blastopore in lamprey development. The study reveals that the blastopore remains open throughout development and that the mesoblast originates from the differentiation of yolk cells in the angles formed by the invaginated mesenteron and the epiblast.
